Package org.azd.utils

Class Url

java.lang.Object
org.azd.utils.Url
public class Url
extends java.lang.Object
Build the request url dynamically to call Azure DevOps REST API

Azure DevOps REST API has many REST API implementations for all the services. It is segregated as service, resource and area. This implementation helps to call the Azure DevOps REST API with url formed dynamically by passing the correct service, resource and area for respective API

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Url​(AzDDefaultParameters defaultParameters)
    This class expects the instance of AzDDefaultParameters to create the request url

  • Method Details

    • buildRequestUrl

      public java.lang.String buildRequestUrl​(java.lang.String resourceId, java.lang.String project, java.lang.String area, java.lang.String id, java.lang.String resource, java.lang.String apiVersion, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> queryString) throws DefaultParametersException
      Builds the request url dynamically for the passed service, resource and area
      Parameters:
      resourceId - pass the resource id
      project - pass the project name
      area - area of the REST API e.g., Release
      id - id of any entity to pass in
      resource - pass the resource entity e.g., Releases
      apiVersion - pass the API version
      queryString - pass the query string to form the url
      Returns:
      resource area url
      Throws:
      DefaultParametersException - user must instantiate AzDDefaultParameters before calling this method
